segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, creating a large puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see the woman not noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite naughty, taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing dangerously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is encouraging the boy's behavior, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know they can't hear me, so I just watch in frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR
